attributes.name: trigger
attributes.desc: how the popover is triggered, not valid in controlled mode

attributes.name: trigger-keys
attributes.desc: When you click the mouse to focus on the trigger element, you can define a set of keyboard codes to control the display of popover through the keyboard, not valid in controlled mode(2.9.8)

attributes.name: title
attributes.desc: popover title

attributes.name: effect
attributes.desc: Tooltip theme, built-in theme: dark / light

attributes.name: content
attributes.desc: popover content, can be replaced with a default slot

attributes.name: width
attributes.desc: popover width

attributes.name: placement
attributes.desc: popover placement
attributes.optionValue: top | top-start | top-end | bottom | bottom-start | bottom-end | left | left-start | left-end | right | right-start | right-end

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.desc: whether Popover is disabled

attributes.name: visible
attributes.desc: whether popover is visible

attributes.name: v-model:visible
attributes.desc: whether popover is visible

attributes.name: offset
attributes.desc: popover offset, Popover is built with Tooltip, offset of Popover is undefined, but offset of Tooltip is 12

attributes.name: transition
attributes.desc: popover transition animation, the default is el-fade-in-linear

attributes.name: show-arrow
attributes.desc: whether a tooltip arrow is displayed or not. For more info, please refer to ElPopper

attributes.name: popper-options
attributes.desc: parameters for popper.js

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.desc: custom class name for popover

attributes.name: popper-style
attributes.desc: custom style for popover

attributes.name: show-after
attributes.desc: delay of appearance, in millisecond, not valid in controlled mode

attributes.name: hide-after
attributes.desc: delay of disappear, in millisecond, not valid in controlled mode

attributes.name: auto-close
attributes.desc: timeout in milliseconds to hide tooltip, not valid in controlled mode

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.desc: tabindex of Popover

attributes.name: teleported
attributes.desc: whether popover dropdown is teleported to the body

attributes.name: append-to
attributes.desc: which element the popover CONTENT appends to(2.9.10)

attributes.name: persistent
attributes.desc: when popover inactive and persistent is false , popover will be destroyed

attributes.name: virtual-triggering
attributes.desc: Indicates whether virtual triggering is enabled

attributes.name: virtual-ref
attributes.desc: Indicates the reference element to which the popover is attached

attributes.name: reference-to-other
attributes.desc: Inherits all attributes from Tooltip

slots.name: reference
slots.desc: HTML element that triggers popover, only a single root element is accepted

events.name: @before-enter
events.desc: triggers when the entering transition before

events.name: @after-enter
events.desc: triggers when the entering transition ends

events.name: @before-leave
events.desc: triggers when the leaving transition before

events.name: @after-leave
events.desc: triggers when the leaving transition ends
